data.text: @EU_Commission You fooled us @EU_Commission Every simple soul and every scientist knows nuclear waste has nowhere to go. And now you call it green? You have mislead us. Weren’t we going to build a trustworthy EU? 💔😢

@EU_Commission A world whose motto is to defend human rights and eliminate terrorism, but who has deliberately taken the people of Afghanistan hostage to terrorism and is shamelessly silent, will never be safe from terrorism.
@EU_Commission nuclear.. yes... and tensions between Russia and USA have nothing to do with it...

@EU_Commission @ECDC_EU Bluff!!!
More and more people understand your bluff and above all the fact that these injections are not working.

@EU_Commission @VeraJourova @pantellina first, take off those bed sheets off your faces - there is no "pandemic" and we don't pay "air taxes" - second, end this power grab called "federalization", we will not give up our sovereignty - third, shuv your green energy and your chinese "digitization". 🤡

@EU_Commission Thx for Nuclear, it is included because of science.
It should less limiting definitions, pushed for by politics.

This also show the German and Belgian absurdity.
We can not achieve Paris without nuclear.

@EU_Commission @EU_Health @ECDC_EU What about #LongCovid? Vaccines don't prevent it & life has been hell for Thousands of people for months & years now. Many will yet join us. We need a plan, we need treatment, we need help @vonderleyen, @SKyriakidesEU & @EU_Health!

@EU_Commission @ECDC_EU When the European Commission says "boosters can stop hospitalization" this no longer is a self-disciplined government but an unregulated promotion towards any and all kinds of injections that are abused in their repeated unmanaged distribution from one nation-buyer to the next.
@EU_Commission Thank you: when cure is not enough. When it was caused intentionally, we need prison for the inductors.

@EU_Commission @ECDC_EU The photograph on this post is false. 
Boosters can NOT prevent hospitalization.

@EU_Commission @ECDC_EU The wording is improved on this post. The wording on previous posts was not only false information but revealed not only a lack of scientific validity but, also showed that policies were being defined by the Commission's president that broke the law.

@EU_Commission @ECDC_EU No thanks
@EU_Commission This is pretty obvious greenwashing. Embarrassing, and will negatively impact financing of truly renewable & green infrastructure.
